mapper.update: update base_role set role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_type = #{roleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_status = #{roleStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, role_description = #{roleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, role_code, role_type, role_name, role_status, role_description, creater_id, creater_name, create_time from base_role where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, role_code, role_type, role_name, role_status, role_description, creater_id, creater_name, create_time from base_role
